snippet: The magazine, Die Weltwoche, aimed to draw attention to what it presented as a scourge of robberies in Switzerland with a photo of a boy pointing a gun and the headline "The Roma are coming."
abstract: The magazine, Die Weltwoche, aimed to draw attention to what it presented as a scourge of robberies in Switzerland with a photo of a boy pointing a gun and the headline "The Roma are coming."

headline.main: Cover of Swiss Magazine Draws Accusations of Racism
